product.title: Go Away Custom Chainstitching • Oxford Pennant Original
product.description: Customize a denim jacket with our bestselling Go Away design. Pick out a jacket here, or send one to us! The chainstitching process takes about 3-4 weeks; when it's completed, we'll ship it back to you! *This design must be paired with a denim jacket or vest.
product.descriptionHtml:
Customize a denim jacket with our bestselling Go Away design.

Pick out a jacket here, or send one to us! 

The chainstitching process takes about 3-4 weeks; when it's completed, we'll ship it back to you!

*This design must be paired with a denim jacket or vest.
